narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent without any additional action on your part once all sites are determined to be in 
compliance. If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
This site is determined to be in compliance. All sites used for regulated activity must demonstrate full compliance with the 
Animal Welfare Act prior to issuance of a license. 
 
Conducting activity from any site without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Alexandra Calderon, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
